participant_1.background: for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.background: my parents were both very athletic. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater.

content.text: hi, how are you? I just got back from the beach. what are your hobbies?
I like to run what do you do for fun
I love to run. I am an elementary teacher. what about you? do you have hobbies?
I do marathons and I'm a life coach
that sounds fun. I am a teacher. do you like the beach? I do
